title: Visma Brings Gravaa Tire Pressure Regulators and a Teen Phenom to Van Aert’s Paris-Roubaix Quest
content:
Will Gravaa gadgets and hotshot rookie Matthew Brennan help Van Aert write his fairtale ending at Paris-Roubaix? 'Game changer' system being tested in cobblestone recons.

Read the full article at Visma Brings Gravaa Tire Pressure Regulators and a Teen Phenom to Van Aert’s Paris-Roubaix Quest on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
